title: Analyst

title: Engineering Technician
description: •Assisted in all engineering-related activities relevant to the construction and renovation/repair of city roadways, bridges, subdivisions, civil site projects as well as capital improvement projects. •Performed required tasks related to basic engineering as well as research-related activities involved with tax map department and GIS requirements. •Reviewed preliminary plats, final plat’s and construction drawings for adherence to city and county standards •Responsible for conducting field inspections of new residential development pertaining mainly to drainage as well as resolving issues through project involvement and developing a solution within established guidelines •Ran the street program in 2009 & 2010 to include budgeting and execution of targeted street repairs within the City

title: Project Manager
description: •Management of each project ensuring all paperwork to include requests for information (RFI’s), change orders, submittal’s, cost-coding each item, monthly pay applications are completed. •Conducted pre-bid, pre-construction and project meetings as well as created and controlled project schedule. •Personally developed property specific Scopes of Work (used as the ACCOR standard amongst all project managers). •At the completion of each project, an audit was conducted on each specific project to include any scope changes, and change orders to ensure continuity throughout project financially. My audit scores for these projects averaged of 94%.
name: Brent Allen
